verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:24
verses.text: Joab the son of Zeruiah began to number, but he finished not, because there fell wrath for it against Israel; neither was the number put in the account of the chronicles of king David.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:25
verses.text: And over the king’s treasures was Azmaveth the son of Adiel: and over the storehouses in the fields, in the cities, and in the villages, and in the castles, was Jehonathan the son of Uzziah:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 27:26
verses.text: And over them that did the work of the field for tillage of the ground was Ezri the son of Chelub:
